item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - Miki Matsubara Discography (1980 - 1988) + Bonus | FLAC 16-bit, 44.1KHz

Album: Pocket Park
Release: 01-21-1980
Label: See･Saw

Tracks
01 - 真夜中のドア～Stay With Me (Mayonaka no Door～Stay With Me)

03 - Cryin'

05 - His Woman
06 - Manhattan Wind
07 - 愛はエネルギー (Ai wa Energy)

09 - Trouble Maker
10 - Mind Game
11 - 偽りのない日々 (Itsuwari no Nai Hibi)
12 - 真夜中のドア～Stay With Me (Original Club Mix)
Bonus Track
13 - 真夜中のドア～Stay With Me (More Bounce To The Ounce Mix)
